hera.wallet

Interface KeyManageable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Wallet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWallet, NaiveWallet, SecureWallet, ServerKeyStoreWallet

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface KeyManageable
extends java.io.Closeable

    • Method Detail

      • bindKeyStore

        void bindKeyStore(java.security.KeyStore keyStore)
        Bind a keystore with wallet. This operation has a meaning only for WalletType.Secure. For other wallet type, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        keyStore - a java keystore

      • saveKey

        void saveKey(AergoKey aergoKey,
             java.lang.String password)
        Save an aergo key to the key store. This operation has no meaning to WalletType.Naive.
        Parameters:
        aergoKey - an aergo key
        password - an encrypt key
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • saveKey

        void saveKey(AergoKey aergoKey,
             Identity identity,
             java.lang.String password)
        Save an aergo key to the key store. This operation has no meaning to WalletType.Naive.
        Parameters:
        aergoKey - an aergo key
        identity - an identity to save key
        password - an encrypt key
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • exportKey

        java.lang.String exportKey(Authentication authentication)
        Export an aergo key of a current account with encrypted.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication
        Returns:
        encoded encrypted private key
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • listKeyStoreIdentities

        java.util.List<Identity> listKeyStoreIdentities()
        Get all the stored identities in a binded key store.
        Returns:
        stored identities
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • unlock

        boolean unlock(Authentication authentication)
        Unlock account with Authentication.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication
        Returns:
        unlock result
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • lock

        boolean lock(Authentication authentication)
        Lock current account with Authentication.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication
        Returns:
        unlock result
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • storeKeyStore

        void storeKeyStore(java.lang.String path,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Store the keystore to the path. This operation has a meaning only for WalletType.Secure. For other wallet type, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        path - a path
        password - a password used in storing key store
        Throws:
        UnbindedKeyStoreException - if it's WalletType.Secure and keystore is not binded
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
